page.title: 16LEISURE
page.content: {FASHION}for the teenagers in 1985 includes bleached denims,kicker shoes or boots,casual raincoats or kagouls , smurf hats and pringle sweaters. Ladies are wearing a lot of red or peach coloured dresses or suits this year.Cotton fabric is popular.There is a choice of skirt lengths according to individual taste{ {TEENAGE PASTIMES }include T.V. and video ,diso dancing,football,tennis, golf,fishing and youth clubs. {ADULT PASTIMES}include television, video,D.I.Y.,gardening,car, keep fit,swimming,snooker and golf. {HOLIDAYS}are spent in Spain or Majorca but Millport and Blackpool are still popular on the home front.Caravaning is booming.Long haul to America is less popular this yer with a strong dollar but the Far East is getting more visitors .
